title: Poster, "Edward II, Christopher Marlowe, Teatr Nowy, Warszawa", 1986
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: White poster with crudely-drawn hand near center, with index finger pointing up and to right. In top right corner, text reads: "EDWARD II"  and "Christopher Marlowe" in black. Across bottom, text reads: "TEATR NOWY/ Warszawa" in black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Edward II, Christopher Marlowe, Teatr Nowy, Warszawa", 1986.
1986. Photo-offset lithograph on paper. Gift of Sara and Marc Benda. 2009-20-26.
